root: ^Yes, I wanted to discuss the destabilized magic.
^We assumed as much. It's been a mess for all of our citizens. We just hope we're doing enough to keep them safe for the time being.
^Yes, the safety of our people is of the upmost importance.
^Me? Oh, I'm fine, thank you for asking. How is your resource distribution going with all of this? Do you have enough to sustain your house?
^Our resources have been greatly damaged. Our food supply has been greatly weakened. You see, us Slimes have relied on magic for our crop maintenance. Without it, our food grows much slower.
^Since you are here, perhaps you can provide an outside perspective in regards to some ongoing discussions.
^Well, since farming is much slower now, most farmers have had to find new jobs to make enough money. But this just means that crop growth is getting even slower. Do you have any suggestions?

DOTHEWORKYOURSELVES: ^Well, you could always do the work yourselves?
^Being the house leaders, I assume you are in no financial turmoil. It would be a great kindness to supply the food yourselves, as you have no need for financial gain.
^Perhaps we could, but what if a danger arises?
^There are two of you. One of you can stay back and alert in case immediate action is needed.
^I am in support of this idea.
HIREFARMERSFROMOTHERHOUSES: ^I understand that your house is unique in the use of magic for farming. Perhaps you could hire farmers from other houses to pick up the slack.
^Would farmers from other houses be able to sustain their own houses if they were working here instead?
^As much as I want to provide for our citizens, I would rather not take away from other houses.
^Sorry, we thank you for your idea. But perhaps we must continue those discussions later.
^We do enjoy talking with you, but we must be off for now.
